title: The History Reference Collection   (PDF)
description:
Books : History : English

This selection of PDF reference books is largely a re-up of my much earlier upload focussed on Historical subjects. It includes some substantial and incredibly useful titles. The original uploads are not mine; but I have sourced them and collected them together for convenience. I offer particular thanks to whoever _F1_ might be on The Pirate Bay. His offerings were remarkably wide-ranging and consistently excellent.

Users of this selection will, I am sure, soon discover that PDF versions are ideal for casual reference (in the way that you might access a tome in a University Library) but are not - other than for those few who really can comfortably read text off an illuminated screen for long periods - really substitutes for the hard copy when intensive study is required. Unfortunately, in my experience, such reference works as are offered here are far too often unavailable to students and other readers in their local libraries, either because the books are not on the shelves at all - having been lost, damaged, stolen or loaned out - or because there are just too few copies available to meet the demand that should have been anticipated.

The titles included are:

Cambridge Companions to:
The Age of Pericles
Ancient Greek Law
Ancient Greek Political Thought
The Age of Augustus
The Age of Constantine
The Roman Republic
The Babylonian World
The Cambridge Ancient History
The Cambridge History of Africa
The Cambridge History of Russia
The Cambridge History of Early Inner Asia
The New Cambridge Modern History
The Second World War - Winston Churchill
The New Cambridge Medieval History
The Civil War - Shelby Foote
Historical Atlas of Ancient Rome
Middle Ages Reference Library - Judson Knight
The Cambridge History of Greek and Roman Warfare
Blackwell's Companion to International History 1900-2001
Plagues in World History
The Cambridge History of the Byzantine Empire
The Oxford History of Modern Europe
The Oxford History of the Classical World

Happy browsing......and seed on!
